testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to update the information of the course price plan with the specified ID via an API connection.
testcase.name: When a PATCH request with valid authorization credentials and correct data (id) is sent to the
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/updatePricePlan/96" path parameters................passed * The api user prepares a PATCH request to send to the api updatePricePlan endpoint, containing the information "Price Plans", "2024-06-01 - 2024-06-30", 30, 100 and 2004..passed * The api user sends a "PATCH" request body and saves the returned response..passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "remark" information in the response body is "success"..passed * The api user verifies that the "Message" information in the response body is "Successfully Updated."..passed * The api user verifies that the "Updated Price Plans ID" information in the returned response body is the same as the id path parameter written in the endpoint..passed
